price: জানি থোৱা, মানুহে সেইটোৱে পায়, যিটো সি চেষ্টা কৰে,
arabic: وَأَن لَّيۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-an laysa lil'insāni illā mā saʿā
